parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.52

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes all magazines of the given type from given vehicle. Use turret path [-1] for driver's turret.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''removeMagazinesTurret''' [magazineName, turretPath]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [magazineName, turretPath]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>vehicle player '''removeMagazinesTurret''' ["60rnd_cmflaremagazine",[-1]]</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_tank '''removeMagazinesTurret''' ["20Rnd_120mmSABOT_M1A2",[0]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMagazineTurret]], [[magazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazineTurret]], [[weaponsTurret]], [[addWeaponTurret]], [[removeWeaponTurret]], [[turretLocal]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead: New Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on July 30, 2011 - 18:42 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Kylania|Kylania]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Here's how you would remove all machine gun ammo from an M1A2 TUSK:<br>
 remove the gunner's M240 ammo.
 <code>this removeMagazinesTurret ["1200Rnd_762x51_M240",[0]];</code>

 remove the commander's M2 ammo.
 <code>this removeMagazinesTurret ["100Rnd_127x99_M2",[0,0]];</code>

 remove the loader's M240 ammo.
 <code>this removeMagazinesTurret ["100Rnd_762x51_M240",[0,1]];</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
